snippet: There are roughly 3,800 homeless youths on the streets of New York City, said the Empire State Coalition, yet only 250 city-financed youth shelter beds are available.
abstract: Coalition of advocacy groups testify before New York City Council hearing on prevalence of sex trafficking among homeless city youth; call on Council to lock in a minimum of $12.6 million for runaway and homeless youth services, and to provide for an additional $1.5 million in the 2014 fiscal year budget to expand services for runaway and homeless youth.
lead_paragraph: There are roughly 3,800 homeless youths on the streets of New York City, said the Empire State Coalition, yet only 250 city-financed youth shelter beds are available.

headline.seo: Groups Press New York City Council on Budget for Homeless
headline.main: Groups Press City Council on Budget for Homeless
headline.print_headline: Groups Press City Council On Budget For Homeless
